description: Information and guidance on the Condition Data Collection (CDC) programme.

attachments.title: CDC Guide to completing the School Questionnaire
CDC List of Schools - Tranche 1 and 2
FE CDC List of FE Colleges
FE CDC Guide for FE colleges

details.body:
From early 2017 to Autumn 2019, the DfE’s Condition Data Collection (CDC) programme will visit every government maintained school in England to collect data about the physical condition of school buildings and how they are managed.

From May 2019, we are also visiting every government maintained FE college to collect similar data so that we will have a comprehensive picture of the condition of the government maintained school and college estate in England.

We are working with 6 external organisations to deliver the programme, as listed below:

  • Arcadis – Technical Services Manager
  • Aecom - Surveying Organisation
  • Capita - Surveying Organisation
  • Faithful + Gould – Surveying Organisation
  • Rider Levett Bucknall – Surveying Organisation
  • KyKloud – IT Supplier

This page contains detailed information and guidance on:

  • CDC for schools, responsible bodies and the general public
  • Further education condition data collection (FE CDC) for FE colleges and other interested parties

CDC Purpose, Benefits and Limitations

PDF, 120 KB, 4 pages

This file may not be suitable for users of assistive technology.

change_history.note: Added FE CDC guide for FE colleges and FE CDC List of FE Colleges.
We have uploaded the list of schools due to be visited in Tranche 5 of the Condition Data Collection (CDC) programme.
Inclusion of CDC Tranche 3 and the CDC Purpose, Benefits and Limitations document
Updated to include a list of the schools identified in tranche 1 and 2 of the data collection.
Updated to include the CDC Guide to completing the School Questionnaire.
